Class Stats ¶

Synopsis

Attributes
size

integer Size of the file in bytes
readtime

integer The last time the file was accessed (unix time)
writetime

integer The last time the file was written to (unix time)
statustime

integer The last time the file was accessed (unix time)
Functions
fs.stats()

Gets information about a file

Attributes

Stats.size ¶

integer Size of the file in bytes

Stats.readtime ¶

integer The last time the file was accessed (unix time)

Stats.writetime ¶

integer The last time the file was written to (unix time)

Stats.statustime ¶

integer The last time the file was accessed (unix time)

Functions

Gets information about a file
